description:
Beautiful Giselle, a noble being who lives eternal life under the power of a forest spirit, could not turn away from the two brothers who were abandoned in the forest. She hoped for the happiness of the two who had become her disciples and whom she had welcomed as a sister and a teacher.

But what they wanted was to be only by her side.

“Giselle will eventually love us.”>
